name: ContractoriumPlatform

methods.name: resign_manager
methods.desc:
A function that accepts a new Algorand address and sets the manager to this address.
The transaction can only succeed if the invoker is the current manager.

methods.name: set_cut
methods.desc:
A function that accepts a new Algorand address and sets the manager to this address.
The transaction can only succeed if the invoker is the current manager.

methods.name: create_bounty_program
methods.desc:
A method to create and store a bug bounty program on the Algorand Blockchain, using Boxes.
It accepts a name, a list of authorized members, who can accept bounties, and a description of the program itself.

methods.name: verify_program
methods.desc: Verify a program, indicating the program is verified by the platform.

methods.name: delete_program
methods.desc: A contract method to delete a Bug Bounty program.

methods.name: delete_report
methods.desc: A contract method to delete a Bug Bounty report by the reporter.

methods.name: create_report
methods.desc: Create a report, which is represented as an Algorand Standard asset.

methods.name: close_and_pay_report
methods.desc:
Close and pay a report, this function accepts a PaymentTransaction as a parameter.
Additionally, if the report is closed, the Asset representing the bounty will be reconfigured and transfered to the bounty program owner. Furthermore, if the PaymentTransaction's parameters are valid, the hunter will be paid.

methods.name: payday
methods.desc: Function that will pay out a specified cut from the contract's address to the creator's address.

desc: The base Algorand Contract for the Contractorium Bug Bounty Platform for Smart Contracts.
